properties.description: The format the image will have, currently only .bmp and .png are supported.
properties.name: ImageFormat

properties.description: The resolution the generated images will have.
properties.name: Resolution

properties.description: If enabled will choose a random resolution between Resolution and ResolutionMax for each captured image.  This is useful for generating Training data.
properties.name: bRandomResolution

properties.description: The maximum Resolution to use if bRandomResolution is enabled.
properties.name: ResolutionMax

properties.description: Perform anti aliasing when an image is rendered.  Highly recommended for basic images, but might cause issues if used with segmentation or depth generators.
properties.name: bAntiAliasing
